args: Still, I'm going to need a lot of allies\nif I hope to reclaim my rightful place\non the throne.
With my loyal subjects at my side,\nI'll show that dastard Werner just how\nfar below me he truly is! Aha ha ha!
...And speak of the devil! Ho there! You!

Your grand leader, the great and powerful
Emperor Emile, has returned! Now gather
up that pathetic sack of bone and skin you
call a body and rise to fight at my side!
Uhhh...the emperor? You? Seriously?\nEr, I guess maybe I see a resemblance\nto Emile if I squint really hard, but...
I VERY MUCH BEG YOUR PARDON?!\nSince when are you slack-jawed peasants\non a first name basis with me?!
Friend, I don't have time to mess around\nwith impersonators or...whatever you are.\nNow please, leave me be.

Don't you walk away from me, you wretch!
Ooo, I'm going to have you clapped in
irons and thrown into the dankest hole
in all the land!
Ah! You there! I, the great and benevolent\nEmperor Emile, have finally made my\nlong-awaited and triumphant return!
Oy, give 'er a rest, wouldja?! I'm busy!\nGo do yer impressions to someone what\ngives a fig, ya daft dandy!

IMPRESSIONS?! Why, I simply cannot
BELIEVE the insolence of these people!
She's definitely going to join that other
fellow in the pit once I'm in power again...
Hmm... But now that I think about it,\nwhy does everyone here seem to be\nin such a terrible hurry?

Did no one ever teach them to listen when
they are spoken to? This is PRECISELY
why I never mingle with the common folk
unless I have a hankering for pottage...

Yes, well, never mind all that. I'm certain
I'll find someone who knows how to pay
proper respects if I go somewhere with
more people.
Ah, excellent! I knew I'd find people here!\nTime to lay on that famous Emile charm...\n*iiiiiiiinhaaaaaaaale*
ATTEND ME, YOU DOGSBODIES!\nYOUR GREAT AND POWERFUL\nEMPEROR EMILE HAS RETURNED!

(Yes! See how they stare at me with utter
and rapt attention! Now all that's left is to
wait for them to raise a chorus of mighty
huzzahs at my grand return!)
Ah ha ha! You sound just like him, mister!\nTalk about your spot-on impressions!
Do you have manure in your eye, serf?!\nI AM the real Emile!
Nice try, buddy. We might even buy it if\nwe hadn't all just been to Emile's funeral.
THE WHO OF YOU WENT TO THE WHAT?!
Wow, you're really loyal to the guy, huh?\nMakes sense you wouldn't want to believe\nhe was assassinated.
But the longer you hide from reality,\nthe harder it's gonna be on you.
Still, good on you, I suppose. I never\nthought the previous emperor had such\nardent supporters on his side.
And what is THAT supposed to mean?!
I mean, even you have to admit he wasn't\nexactly the most benevolent ruler around.
Remember how he was constantly putting\nup these ridiculous statues? He loved to\nwaste money like that.
Those statues were designed to showcase\nthe power and glory of the emperor!
Yeah, well, they wound up forcing most of\nus to move to make room of 'em—and it\nain't like we got compensated for it!

Emile was a real piece of work, all right.
Like how he'd purposely cause problems
just so he could swoop in and fix 'em in
the hopes of earning our praise? Ha ha!
All pretty embarrassing, if I'm honest.\nDid he really think we were too dumb\nto see through all that?
And didn't he go around attacking places\nwith dragons and combat androids?
Th-that was to demonstrate my power!
Guy didn't want to get down in the mud\nhimself, so he sent someone else to do\nthe dirty work. Some power that is!
Well, at least he had one true supporter.\nSuppose he can rest in peace with that!
AAAAH HA HA HA HA HA!
(I have no defense against the slings\nand arrows of their cruelty.)
(...Because it's true. Every word coming\nfrom their little peasant food holes is\ncompletely true.)
(All that I did was so I could force the\nworld to acknowledge my power—and\nmore specifically, to acknowledge ME.)
If the empire had been peaceful, your\ntalents might very well have been lauded.
(All that I have done—all my efforts and\nschemes—have only served to tighten the\nnoose around my own proud neck...)
(Perhaps there was never a way to\nsucceed. Not for someone like me.)
(I've failed honestly and I've failed\nunderhandedly. I'm just a...a loser.)
(I'm not fit to rule a pigsty,\nmuch less a nation!)
Gotta say though, I'd take ol' Emperor\nEmile over this new guy seven days a\nweek and twice on Sunday.
We work day and night just to pay the\nmad taxes he's set. He's treating us\nlike slaves!
I hear he's using all that money to plan\nan attack on Saint Lotier.
We don't even want a war, and yet that's\nwhere our hard-earned money is going.\nOh, but the world can be cruel.
The old Emperor had his issues, but at\nleast he took it easy on the taxes.
Well, that's simply because I left all such\nmatters up to Magnus, who...
(Wait a minute. This is my chance!)
(The opposite of war is PEACE!\nThese people want peace!)
(If I dispose of Werner, end the war,\nand lower their taxes...)
(Everyone here will sing my praises and\nmy country will HAVE to recognize me\nfor my talents!)
Listen well, my dear and loyal subjects!\nI understand your plight all too well!
I, the great Emperor Emile, will free you\nfrom your suffering by taking out the\npretender who now sits on the throne!
You all can rest easy and wait for the\ngood news to come! Aha! Aha ha ha!
Er, you don't think that was the REAL\nEmperor Emile, do you?
Oh, there's no way. Still, whoever that\nfellow is, he's in for a world of hurt if he\ngoes against the new emperor...
